feature.label: Source for ECF Presence API Feature
feature.description:
Generated source feature. The original description is:
This feature provides the ECF Presence API. The ECF Presence API allows distribution of user presence and instant messaging using common Instant Messaging transports (XMPP/XMPPS, IRC, MSM).
